channel.title: Ubuntu and RuneScape
channel.description:
Hello, i decided to dual boot ubuntu with win7 and i just installed ubuntu 10.10, everything went good, i installed java, setup desired stuff.
I have a question, i know some of you use ubuntu and probably still play runescape on it and i was wondering how cpu is acting while doing that. Last time i used ubuntu, version was 10.04 somewhere at the end of april (i think that's when it came out) well it was pure shit, the cpu usage used to go somewhere at 80% while playing. Now i see it's about 60% quite good but still not the same as windows 7 (30-40%)
So i want to ask how much cpu usage do you guys get while playing? Btw i chose the lowest settings as possible.
Could this be a problem of me or everyone has it.
CPU is: AMD Athlon 64 X2 Dual Core 5000+ 2.61GHz
Running ubuntu 32bit.

item.title: Ubuntu and RuneScape
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Oh yes, obviously you need to install your video card driver, that was the problem.

Read full topic

item.title: Ubuntu and RuneScape
item.dc:creator: @flj0yter0p flj0yter0p
item.description:
@flj0yter0p wrote:

[quote=“laurent 248, post:4, topic:383040”][quote author=flj0yter0p link=topic=478822.msg3505574#msg3505574 date=1298131942]

Run ubuntu 64 bit…
[/quote]Wow i have to re-install everything again? Will that fix the problem?

Ubuntu’s installation is really quick and it’s really easy to install. Just do it.[/quote]Yeah but i mean i already installed alot of softwares and stuff and really can’t bother doing everything all over again.

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:5, topic:383040”]Running the 64-bit version really shouldn’t affect your ‘problem’. My question to you is how are you getting this cpu usage number? It might not be what you think it is.[/quote]Well it goes high only when the runescape client is running, especialy when i’m connected to the server.

EDIT: I just installed OpenGL for my NVIDIA and DirectX, i set the settings to OpenGL on RuneScape and now cpu is at 40-50% even while running and walking, before running and walking was causing it to go up to 80%! Also CPU temperatures are now quite normal.

I think the problem is solved. Thanks for all the replies.

Read full topic

item.title: Ubuntu and RuneScape
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Running the 64-bit version really shouldn’t affect your ‘problem’. My question to you is how are you getting this cpu usage number? It might not be what you think it is.

Read full topic

item.title: Ubuntu and RuneScape
item.dc:creator: @laurent_248 laurent 248
item.description:
@laurent_248 wrote:

[quote=“flj0yter0p, post:3, topic:383040”][quote author=Fat Cookies link=topic=478822.msg3505440#msg3505440 date=1298116072]
Run ubuntu 64 bit…
[/quote]Wow i have to re-install everything again? Will that fix the problem?[/quote]

Ubuntu’s installation is really quick and it’s really easy to install. Just do it.

Read full topic
